root.name: Falling Stars
root.description: Overview Falling stars is a role playing videogame, developed by Ivolgamus and published by Agetec. Falling Stars was released on both the PC and PlayStation 2 August 24, 2007 in Europe and August 26th, 2008 in North America. Gameplay You play as Luna the main character in the game, Luna’s uncle discovers an abandoned mine which he decides to investigate and eventually live in. Over time the mine takes control of Luna’s uncle’s mind where he starts to turns his pets into evil monsters. The main goal of the game is to cure the evil monsters and then eventually cure Luna’s uncle.
